eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

functionDecorators.name: acceptDebt
functionDecorators.description: Return whether the given goblin accepts more debt. Revert on non-goblin.

functionDecorators.name: getInterestRate
functionDecorators.description: Return the interest rate per second, using 1e18 as denom.

functionDecorators.name: isGoblin
functionDecorators.description: Return whether the given address is a goblin.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: killFactor
functionDecorators.description: Return the kill factor for the goblin + ETH debt, using 1e4 as denom. Revert on non-goblin.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setGoblin
functionDecorators.description: Set the configuration for the given goblin. Must only be called by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: goblin
parameterDecorators.description: The goblin address to set configuration.

parameterDecorators.name: _isGoblin
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the given address is a valid goblin.

parameterDecorators.name: _acceptDebt
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the goblin is accepting new debts.

parameterDecorators.name: _workFactor
parameterDecorators.description: The work factor value for this goblin.

parameterDecorators.name: _killFactor
parameterDecorators.description: The kill factor value for this goblin.

functionDecorators.name: setParams
functionDecorators.description: Set all the basic parameters. Must only be called by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _minDebtSize
parameterDecorators.description: The new minimum debt size value.

parameterDecorators.name: _interestRate
parameterDecorators.description: The new interest rate per second value.

parameterDecorators.name: _reservePoolBps
parameterDecorators.description: The new interests allocated to the reserve pool value.

parameterDecorators.name: _killBps
parameterDecorators.description: The new reward for killing a position value.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: workFactor
functionDecorators.description: Return the work factor for the goblin + ETH debt, using 1e4 as denom. Revert on non-goblin.
